generalSessions.name: Davidson County General Sessions Court
judges: Multiple divisions - check ticket for assigned division
generalSessions.parking: Public parking available at multiple locations downtown
generalSessions.publicTransport: Accessible via Nashville MTA bus system

municipal.name: Nashville Metropolitan Court
municipal.note: Handles city ordinance violations; state traffic offenses go to General Sessions

publicDefender.note: Available for indigent defendants in criminal traffic cases

contestingTicket.deadline: Must appear or pay within 7 days of citation
process: Appear at Traffic Division window to enter plea
Court date will be assigned for not guilty plea
Discovery requests must be filed with the court

courtDates.scheduling: Court dates typically scheduled 4-6 weeks out
courtDates.continuances: One continuance may be granted by clerk; subsequent require judge approval
courtDates.noShow: Failure to appear may result in bench warrant and license suspension

diversionProgram.name: Davidson County Traffic Diversion Program
eligibility: No prior diversions in past 5 years
Violation not involving DUI, reckless driving, or accident with injury
requirements: Pay court costs and program fee
Stay violation-free during probation period (90 days to 1 year)
diversionProgram.cost: Approximately $150-200 including course and court costs

approvedProviders: Various online providers approved by Tennessee DOS
trafficSchool.deadline: Must complete within 90 days of court order

localRules.dressCode: Business casual; no shorts, tank tops, or hats
localRules.electronics: Cell phones must be silenced; no recording without permission
localRules.checkIn: Arrive 30 minutes early to clear security and check in

specialConsiderations.schoolZones: Enhanced fines in school zones; strict enforcement
specialConsiderations.redLightCameras: Civil violations; does not add points to license
specialConsiderations.speedCameras: Not currently used in Davidson County

locations: Public Square Garage - 101 James Robertson Pkwy
parking.note: Arrive early for parking; downtown parking fills quickly
